channel.title: How do i add perfect ring?
channel.description: how do i add perfect ring or make an items stats high like a p ring and make it owner only? [br][size=1]Posted on: May 14, 2007, 08:28:50 PM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:

bladerina1:

oh ok i see but how do i make it so that only admins can wear it?

dont give the item to non mods.

item.title: How do i add perfect ring?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

ALL server sources have an Item.cfg. It might just say Item, but it’s the one that does NOT look like notepad.

item.title: How do i add perfect ring?
item.dc:creator: @shadow235 shadow235
item.description:
@shadow235 wrote:

Open item.cfg, Seach the perfect ring item id. If you have it you have it. If you don’t add it. Use the format for all the other items.

Read full topic
